ValidationRule.description: Validation rule to prevent update to Assessment records, after 30 days from the Evaluation date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( TODAY() - DATEVALUE( Date_Time_of_the_Evaluation__c ) > 30, OR ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'KPI_Assessment', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Call_Quality_Assessment' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Quality Assessment cannot be updated after 30 days from Evaluation date.
